name: Amethyst Crystal Ball
des: Enhances spiritual awareness, calmness, and inner peace. Ideal for meditation, intuition, and energy balancing.

name: Black Agate Crystal Ball
des: Provides grounding and protective energy while absorbing negativity. Supports emotional strength and stability.

name: Blue Lace Agate Crystal Ball
des: Promotes calm communication and emotional relaxation. Encourages peace, clarity, and gentle healing energy.

name: Clear Quartz Crystal Ball
des: Amplifies positive energy and spiritual focus. Known as a master healer for clarity and balance.

name: Orange Calcite Crystal Ball
des: Boosts creativity, confidence, and joyful energy. Supports emotional upliftment and motivation.

name: Rose Quartz Crystal Ball
des: Radiates love, compassion, and emotional healing energy. Encourages harmony and heart balance.

name: Sodalite Crystal Ball
des: Enhances mental clarity, intuition, and self-expression. Supports emotional balance and inner truth.

name: Mahogany Crystal Ball
des: Provides grounding, protection, and emotional strength. Helps restore balance and stability.
